DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect lidocaine ( numbing medication ) inside uterus patient pain early abortion , compare paracervical block ( lidocaine inject either side cervix ) .
DOC.brief_title: Lidocaine Pain Management First Trimester Abortions
DOC.detailed_description: The Investigators intend conduct randomize , patient-blinded control trial Oregon Health Science University Planned Parenthood Columbia Willamette . Women approach study make decision terminate pregnancy . The woman blind randomized one two study arm . Group 1 : investigator apply pressure cap needle paracervical block cervical-vaginal reflexion 4 8 o'clock . This approximate step involve paracervical block without inject patient . Following , patient receive 5 milliliter intrauterine infusion 4 % lidocaine use sterile 3mm Novak curette . The infusion place slowly 3 minute . Group 2 : standard paracervical block ( 8 milliliter 1 % lidocaine 4 8 o'clock cervical-vaginal reflection ) place . Following , 3 mm Novak curette place vagina hold external o cervix 3 minute . The curette place cervix infusion perform . This approximate step involve intrauterine infusion without inject patient . During procedure , woman group ask rate pain various time use 10 cm visual analog scale ( VAS ) .
